lead_paragraph: Rags to Riches, the first filly in 102 years to win the Belmont Stakes, was examined by Dr. Steve Allday at Belmont Park yesterday, a day after being pulled up at the start of a scheduled five-furlong workout. The trainer Todd Pletcher reported that she seemed to be in good condition, but that a complete physical was needed to determine whether she would run next month in the Alabama Stakes at Saratoga.Rags to Riches will be sent to the University of Pennsylvania’s New Bolton Center in Kennett Square, Pa., for more tests.
